Title: Revised guidelines issued for COVID-19 testing - All India Radio
Description: The Indian Council of Medical Research revised its strategy to fight the spread of the new coronavirus today, saying all hospitalised patients with severe acute respiratory illness, shortness of breath and having fever and cough will now be tested for COVID-1…

Title: Coronavirus: Coalition financing development of vaccines needs at least $2 billion - The Indian Express
Description: Vice-Chair of CEPI Dr Gagandeep Kang told The Indian Express that presently they have $ 800 million and money was now trickling in from many governments and others.

Title: Eating lemon, turmeric or mango cannot prevent coronavirus, says WHO - The Indian Express
Description: At a time when people are avoiding consumption of meat, WHO emphasised, "Eating hygienically prepared and well-cooked chicken is safe and does not cause the spread of the new coronavirus."

Title: Indian-origin team develops test to spot corona infection in 2 hrs - Greater Kashmir

Title: Coronavirus survivors list 12 telling symptoms of the disease - Times of India
Description: The COVID-19 infection has been declared a pandemic which has led to worldwide lockdowns and an overall state of panic and fear. The virus presents itself with flu-like symptoms that include fever and dry cough. As doctors around the world are still grappling…

Title: Coronavirus: Why is India testing so little? - BBC News
Description: India has one of the world’s lowest testing rates for coronavirus, and that is worrying many experts.
